Aligns diagrams to Deliverable 1 UML/DFD theme. %% Related: diagrams/class-mobile-repositories.mmd (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController), diagrams/class-mobile-services.mmd (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) sequenceDiagram autonumber participant App as QuantumZero Mobile App participant Storage as SecureStorageService participant DidRepo as DidRepository participant CredRepo as CredentialRepository participant DB as Local SQLite (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) App->>Storage: initialize(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) activate Storage Storage-->>App: ok deactivate Storage App->>DidRepo: initialize(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) activate DidRepo DidRepo->>DB: Open DB
ensure dids table activate DB DB-->>DidRepo: ok deactivate DB DidRepo-->>App: ok deactivate DidRepo App->>CredRepo: initialize(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) activate CredRepo CredRepo->>DB: Open DB
ensure credentials table activate DB DB-->>CredRepo: ok deactivate DB CredRepo-->>App: ok deactivate CredRepo
